content: Those aboard the Sunny find themselves in a very dark and cold part of the ocean, unaware of the sea monsters swimming around. As they activate some lights, they find themselves staring face-to-face with a few of them, much to their horror. A caption comes up, commenting that the area they are in is known as "The Deep Sea," a part of the sea where light cannot reach, and no normal creature exists. It is also known as "The Underworld of the Sea."
